ygData.subject: RE: Dual Wield  (Was:Re: pvp bard song suggestions)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, having twice as many people swinging is the same as getting twice as many swings - both will lower the overall deviation from the average. -- John H.
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 22 Sep 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> Ok, I buy into this but in the 'real world' errr 'cuse me in Norrath when
> you are in a party and u got a healer - I think it would be good to have
> some hvy dmg blades be swinging as well as some lighter but fast ones. Does
> having more ppl swing the weps make a diffierence?

Yes, having twice as many people swinging is the same as
getting twice as many swings - both will lower the overall
deviation from the average.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
